required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Seroepidemiological Study of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Infection in Population Subgroups in the State of São Paulo
clinical_study.official_title: Seroepidemiological Study of SARS-CoV-2 Infection in Population Subgroups in the State of São Paulo

brief_summary.textblock: Seroepidemiological Study of SARS-CoV-2 Infection in Population Subgroups in the State of São Paulo

detailed_description.textblock: This is a cross-sectional study to estimate the prevalence of antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 is different population subgroups in the State of São Paulo

primary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 through serological testing
primary_outcome.description: IgM and IgG antibodies against SARS-CoV-2

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of participants with a positive RT-PCR test result for SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: Positive RT-PCR test result for SARS-CoV-2

arm_group.description: Home contacts of health professionals diagnosed with COVID-19 at the Hospital of Clínic of Medicine School of the University of São Paulo
Refugees living in the city of São Paulo
Blood Donors of the Pró-Sangue Hemocenter Foundation of São Paulo
Participants of the CPP - Butantan Penitentiary Progression Center
Participants of the CHSP - Penitentiary System Hospital Center
Participants of the SABE Project (Health, Wellness and Aging)

arm_group.arm_group_label: ILPI - Long-Term Care Institution for the Elderly
arm_group.description: Residents of the Long-Term Care Institution for the Elderly of Botucatu
Home contacts of children and adolescents diagnosed with COVID-19, attended at the Children's Institute of HCFMUSP

intervention.arm_group_label: ILPI - Long-Term Care Institution for the Elderly
ILPI - Long-Term Care Institution for the Elderly
ILPI - Long-Term Care Institution for the Elderly

biospec_descr.textblock: Nasopharyngeal Swab, Oropharyngeal Swab and Blood Samples

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All potential volunteers invited to participate in the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- All potential eligible participants, but who do not show interest in participating in the study.
